about_the_game:
BUNNY HOP HARE TRIGGER is a first person parkour race to the finish line that is designed from the ground up to be speedrun while also being accessible for those who just want to go FAST.

With 5 uniquely designed worlds for aesthetic variety, you can expect over 100 levels of speedrunning bliss as well as additional bonuses such as an Endless Runner mode and Free Roam!



High speed and mobility is the name of the game. With movement and air strafing inspired from classic FPS games, you will never be capped at what speed you can achieve. The better you get, the faster you go!



As you progress, you'll unlock more and more tools to help you in your quest of become the fastest being in the universe!

These tools range from:

-Grappling Hooks
-Rocket Launchers (for jumping, of course)
-Hang Gliders

And much more!



Bunny Hop Hare Trigger is still in active development, and is relying on community feedback to become the best it can possibly be. If the demo interests you, please consider joining the Discord and sharing your feedback!

name: Bunny Hop Hare Trigger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8,1
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700K CPU # 4.20GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements are an estimate based on the lowest grade PC available for testing. Mileage may vary.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10700KF CPU @ 3.80GHz 3.79 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements are the specs of the PC used to develop the game. Anything at or above the minimum requirements should be perfectly fine.

short_description: Hone your movement skills and strive for the fastest times in this speedrunning/parkour platformer!
